code: import'./css/App.css';import{useState}from'react';import{Input}from'./components/Input.js';import{useHistory}from'./hooks/history';import{History}from'./components/History';import{handleCommand,usePhoneBook}from'./hooks/phoneBook';import{transformPhoneBookObjectToArray}from"./utils/tranformObjectToArray";import{PhoneBook}from'./components/PhoneBook';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function App(){const[command,setCommand]=useState('');const phoneBook=usePhoneBook();const history=useHistory();const perfomCommand=()=>{const response=handleCommand(command,phoneBook);history.addElement(command,response);};const phoneBookArray=transformPhoneBookObjectToArray(phoneBook.phoneBook);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(History,{historyElements:history.elements,deleteHistoryElement:history.deleteElement}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputPhoneBook",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{value:command,setValue:setCommand}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:perfomCommand,children:"Enter"}),history.elements.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:history.deleteHistory,children:"Delete history"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PhoneBook,{phoneBookArray:phoneBookArray})]})]});}export default App;
